## Source: ossf-package-analysis (b06c2a9bef8741ecd851e448b284d8c0eef63b726a77662a1e4f3aec34119f80)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'spammingsynonyms' @ 3.0.1 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
